items.sentence: I\'m sorry, but could you move over a bit so I have room to sit?
If you behave like a servant, you\'ll be treated like a servant.

There\'s one thing I want to do before I go. I want to kiss you.
There\'s something about Tom that makes a lot of girls like him.
Tom has only been pretending that he doesn\'t understand French.
Tom knew that he wouldn\'t be able to finish the report by 2:30.
Just because something is possible doesn\'t make it a good idea.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t want to do that.
Having worked on the farm all day, we were completely tired out.
